name.ja_JP: ファクションチームカップ<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

info.en_US: Refight several battles found during your quests for the factions, as a team!
info.pt_BR: Reviva várias batalhas orridas durante suas missões para as facções, em equipe!
info.de_DE: Bekämpfe nochmals verschiedene Bosse aus den Quests der Fraktionen - als Team!
info.zh_CN: 组成小队再次对抗几个派系任务！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.zh_TW: 組成小隊再次對抗幾個派系任務！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.ja_JP: ファクションクエストで出会った敵と、チーム戦でもう一度戦おう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.ko_KR: 세력 퀘스트 진행 중 싸웠던 몬스터들과 팀으로 다시 싸우세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

core.condition: quest.fd-2-meerkat-cave.solved && quest.rhg-2-crate_smuggle.solved && quest.rftc-3-metalstuff.solved && quest.miners-1-dirtbunnies.solved && quest.bg-2-goat_cave_1.solved && quest.nomadAdv-3-sandman_tomb_1.solved && quest.bakiGuard-2-evil_guard.solved && quest.jungleTrader-2-snowman_thief_2.solved && quest.jungleGreens-2-plantSearch_1.solved

objective.en_US: Refight the \c[3]\v[combat.name.meerkat-special-command-1]\c[0] and his gang of \c[3]Hillkats\c[0] in their cave in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]!

objective.de_DE: Bekämpfe nochmals den \c[3]Hillkat-Anführer\c[0] und seine Bande von \c[3]Hillkats\c[0] in ihrer Höhle in \c[3]Autumn's Rise\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN: 在\c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]的洞穴中再次与\c[3]\v[combat.name.meerkat-special-command-1]\c[0]和他的\c[3]地鼠\c[0]走狗们对战!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP: \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]の洞窟で出会った\c[3]\v[combat.name.meerkat-special-command-1]\c[0]と子分の\c[3]ヒルキャット\c[0]たちともう一度戦え！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.zh_TW: 在\c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]的洞穴中再次與\c[3]\v[combat.name.meerkat-special-command-1]\c[0]和他的\c[3]地鼠\c[0]走狗們對戰!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US: Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.turret-rhg-1]\c[0] that got you in a crossfire in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]!
objective.pt_BR: Derrote a \c[3]\v[combat.name.turret-rhg-1]\c[0] que a colocou em fogo cruzado no \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]!
objective.de_DE: Besiege das \c[3]Illegale Rhombus-Geschütz\c[0], das dich in \c[3]Rookie Harbor\c[0] unter Kreuzfeuer genommen hat!
objective.ja_JP: \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]で集中砲火を浴びせられた\c[3]\v[combat.name.turret-rhg-1]\c[0]を倒せ！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]s\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]!
Remember to \c[3]give them a bath\c[0] first!
objective.pt_BR:
Derrote os \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]s\c[0] na \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]!
Lembre de \c[3]dar um banho neles\c[0] primeiro!
objective.de_DE:
Besiege die \c[3]Dreckigen Pogonickel\c[0] auf dem \c[3]Bergen-Trail\c[0]!
Vergiss nicht, sie vorher \c[3]zu baden\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
击败\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]的\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]\c[0]!
记得\c[3]先给它们洗个澡\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]の\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]水に落としてから\c[0]倒すことを忘れずに！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]에 있는 \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]\c[0]을 처치하세요!
먼저 \c[3]목욕을 시키는\c[0] 것을 잊지 마세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.zh_TW:

name.ja_JP: ゴートファーザー PART I<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Meet the \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/goat-father]\c[0] again and \c[3]defeat his subordinates\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]!
Be careful of \c[3]bombs\c[0]!
objective.pt_BR:
Encontre o \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/goat-father]\c[0] de novo e \c[3]derrote seus subordinados\c[0] na \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]!
Cuidado com as \c[3]bombas\c[0]!
objective.de_DE: Begegne nochmals dem \c[3]Geißpaten\c[0] und \c[3]besiege seine Untergebenen\c[0] auf dem \c[3]Bergen-Trail\c[0]! Vorsicht vor den \c[3]Bomben\c[0]!

在\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]再次击败\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/goat-father]\c[0]和他的\c[3]手下们\c[0]!
小心\c[3]炸弹\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]で出会った\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/goat-father]\c[0]と\c[3]その部下たち\c[0]をもう一度倒せ！
\c[3]爆弾\c[0]に気を付けよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.zh_TW:
在\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]再次擊敗\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/goat-father]\c[0]和他的\c[3]手下們\c[0]!
小心\c[3]炸彈\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Fight the favored machinery of treacherous Ba'kii Kum guards, \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]s\c[0] led by a \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]!
\c[3]Break the leader\c[0] to deactivate the \c[3]shields\c[0] of the turrets!
objective.pt_BR:
Lute contra o maquinário preferido dos traiçoeiros guardas Ba'kii Kum, \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]s\c[0] liderado por um \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]!
\c[3]Quebre o líder\c[0] para desativar os \c[3]escudos\c[0] das torres!
objective.de_DE:
Bekämpfe die Lieblingswaffe der verräterischen Ba'kii-Wachen, die \c[3]Legionsgeschütze v1\c[0], die vom \c[3]Legionsanführer v1\c[0] befehligt werden!
\c[3]Brich den Anführer\c[0], um die \c[3]Schilde\c[0] der Geschütze zu deaktivieren!
objective.zh_CN:
与巴基库姆险恶守卫的爱用机械\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]\c[0]作战，它们的首领是一个\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]!
\c[3]破坏首领\c[0]来降下炮台的\c[3]护盾\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.zh_TW:
與巴基庫姆險惡守衛的愛用機械\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]\c[0]作戰，它們的首領是一個\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]!
\c[3]破壞首領\c[0]來降下砲臺的\c[3]護盾\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
マルーン・バキ警備隊の裏切者が使用していた、\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]率いる\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]\c[0]の部隊を倒せ！ 
まずは\c[3]リーダーをブレイク\c[0]させて、タレットの\c[3]シールド\c[0]を無効化しよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
불성실한 바키쿰 경비원 사이에서 인기 있는 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]이 이끄는 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]\c[0]과 싸우세요!
포탑의 \c[3]방어막\c[0]을 비활성화하려면 \c[3]리더를 격파\c[0]해야 합니다!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
Don't let them \c[3]regenerate over the flames\c[0]!
objective.pt_BR:
Derrote os \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0] no \c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]!
Não deixe eles se \c[3]regenerarem com as chamas\c[0]!
objective.de_DE:
Besiege die \c[3]Rasegeier\c[0] im \c[3]Maronental\c[0]!
Verhindere ihre \c[3]Regenation über den Flammen\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
击败\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0]!
不要让它们在\c[3]火中做自己\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]の\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]炎の上で回復\c[0]させないようにしよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.zh_TW:
擊敗\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.name]\c[0]的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/volturbine-cave]s\c[0]!
不要讓它們在\c[3]火中做自己\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Have another duel with \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0], Bakii'Kums most treasonous guard!
And also trash his \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]s\c[0] while you're at it!
objective.pt_BR:
Tenha outro duelo com \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0], o guarda mais traiçoeiro de Ba'kii Kum!
E também destrua as \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]s\c[0] dele!
objective.de_DE:
Liefere dir ein weiteres Duell mit \c[3]Wache Billston\c[0], Ba'kii Kums Hochverräter!
Und wirf auch gleich seine \c[3]Legionsgeschütze v2\c[0] auf den Müll, wenn du schon mal dabei bist!
objective.zh_CN:
再次与巴基库姆最险恶的守卫\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]决斗!
记得顺带消灭掉他的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
バキーイ・クムの裏切者、\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]ともう一度戦い倒せ！
\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]も壊すことを忘れずに！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
바키쿰의 가장 불성실한 경비원인 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]과 다시 결투하세요!
그리고 그의 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]도 부수세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.zh_TW:
再次與巴基庫姆最險惡的守衛\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/guard-hostile-mustache]\c[0]決鬥!
記得順帶消滅掉他的\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_2]\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
